name: The Replica
description:
The Replica is a short 5-15 minute PS1 Inspired horror game that takes place in a world shambled to ruins with the remaining remnants of humanity struggling to survive in a toxic environment.

You play as "The Last" John Richards  who after a cave exploration  trip has come to realize that his colony is missing and something has gone horribly wrong.  Taking inspiration from classic Third Person Survival Horror Games, you must work your way through what remains of the colony trying to find whatever help remains.

This game is about 5-15 minutes long depending on how you progress through it. The more you take the time to look around and explore, the more of an enjoyable experience it will be.

Some Features Include

  • Phycological Horror (On the nerve at all times)
  • Moderate Scares When the Time is Right
  • Convincing Atmosphere
  • Easter Eggs (Photos of youtubers, Secret Rooms, ETC)

Controls

  • Movement  -  WASD
  • Jump  -  Space
  • Sprint  -  Left Shift

Instructions

  1.  Once you press play game, you must press TAB to lock onto the character otherwise you will just be staring at the void for 6 years.

Feedback

I Would love feedback as i spent a good week on this project. This is my first game in this style, and or genre in general so any suggestions or ideas would be nice!
